code: import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from"../constants/urls";import{goToRecipesList}from"../routers/coordinator";export var login=function login(body,clear,history,setRightButtonText,setIsLoading){setIsLoading(true);axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/login"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);clear();setIsLoading(false);goToRecipesList(history);setRightButtonText('Logout');}).catch(function(err){alert(err.response.data.message);setIsLoading(false);});};export var SingUp=function SingUp(body,clear,history,setRightButtonText,setIsLoading){setIsLoading(true);axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/signup"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);clear();setIsLoading(false);goToRecipesList(history);setRightButtonText('Logout');}).catch(function(err){alert(err.response.data.message);setIsLoading(false);});};
